entry.title: Advent Calendar Door 24
entry.content:
Dear Santa,

itâ€™s the big day once again. Across the globe kids big and small are waiting for you to arrive, and for sure you will not disappoint them. Something that would suit you well is the Arcâ€™teryx Beta LT Jacket, a lightweight & versatile GORE-TEX Pro hardshell that will keep you dry in the meanest Snowstorms. The Beta LT in the Matador colour is a real Santa ðŸŽ… jacket, and as it durable you can slide down chimneys in it, hide your hat and beard under the fantastic StormHood and the breathable material will keep you dry when the bag with presents is a bit heavier because the kids were so good. The large pockets hold a map of the city or region you are in, and in the inside you can keep some snacks for Rudolph warm. Yes dear Santa, I am sure with the Arcâ€™teryx Beta LT Jacket not only you would be very happy & satisfied!

Disclosure: Read The Tips & Rules. The prize (you can choose either the Arcâ€™teryx Beta LT Jacket in Baja for Women or Matador for Men) is sponsored by Arcâ€™teryx and sent directly from them - possible import fees need to be paid by the winner. entry.title: Advent Calendar Door 23
entry.content:
Dear Santa,

When the snow and ice again turn to water they will be contaminated - from sand, dirt and microbes. What one needs then, to make the water safe to drink and cook with, is a lightweight water filter. The Hiker Pro Transparent from Katadyn is a 233 g light water filter that is effective in filtering out microorganisms, chemicals and even bad tastes, and it is also suitable for use with cloudy water. With such a Water Filter one doesnâ€™t need to be thirsty as clean, potable water will never again be a problem!

a Rafflecopter giveaway

Disclaimer: Read The Tips & Rules. The prize is sponsored by Katadyn and sent directly from them - possible import fees need to be paid by the winner. This Advent Calendar Door has been supported financially and with gear from Katadyn.

entry.title: Advent Calendar Door 22
entry.content:
Dear Santa,

Do we sometimes see things too much in black and white? Is light weight really the end of all means? I say no. But it can be nice to dress in Black and White sometimes, especially if it takes the form of Original Liner Mitts and an Original Black Rock Hat in Imperial White! Sure, you might look like a Panda or a Snowman, but with these two items you wonâ€™t be cold at all, thatâ€™s for sure! Made of high-quality materials these Mitts and the Hat squeeze down to nothing when you donâ€™t need them, and expand their toastiness over your ears and hands when you get cold. Perfect for a proper winter!

a Rafflecopter giveaway

Disclaimer: Read The Tips & Rules. The prize (One Imperial Hat in your choice of Size and a Pair of Original Liner Mitts in your Size) is sponsored by BlackRock Gear and sent directly from them - possible import fees need to be paid by the winner. This Advent Calendar Door has been supported financially and with gear from BlackRock Gear.

entry.title: Advent Calendar Door 21
entry.content:
Dear Santa,

Fire, Water, Hot Meal! With the Toaks Ultralight Titanium Cook System CS02 and the 650 ml Pot that equation is ultralight - 166 g light, to be exact. Just add alcohol fuel and ðŸ”¥ and a wee bit later youâ€™re ready to pour the hot water into your pouch to rehydrate your meal and drink a tea, too. This set packs super-small - everything fits into the pot, even the included Spork! Add in that itâ€™s made from the Ultralight Backpackerâ€™s favourite material, Titanium, and you have a winning set that wonâ€™t weigh you down!

entry.title: Advent Calendar Door 19
entry.content:
Dear Santa,

I had a Revelation the other day: How good must be a quilt when it has dozens of positive reviews? The Enlightened Equipment Revelation Quilt is such a quilty, and when you look at the options, specs and possibilities it is easy to understand why: It can be used as a blanket when youâ€™re sleeping on a tropical beach, in autumn on your hikes through Vermontâ€™s colourful forests you close the footbox and stay toasty, and when the first frost covers the ground you connect it to your sleeping pad and will have a warm & comfortable night!. Add in that you can design the quilt just like you want - from the colour of the fabrics to the down quality, length, width and temperature rating you want. Itâ€™s so versatile that itâ€™s easy to understand why there are so many satisfied ownwers of an Enlightened Equipment Revelation Quilt around!

a Rafflecopter giveaway

Disclaimer: Read The Tips & Rules. The prize (A Revelation Quilt which you can configure to your needs!) is sponsored by Enlightened Equipment and possible import fees need to be paid by the winner. This Advent Calendar Door has been supported financially and with gear from Enlightened Equipment.

Read my Enlightened Equipment Revelation Quilts Review.
